pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pesalehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍantā pesale bhikkhū omasanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.1.3: jātiyāpi, nāmenapi, gottenapi, kammenapi, sippenapi, ābādhenapi, liṅgenapi, kilesenapi, āpattiyāpi; hīnenapi akkosena khuṃsenti vambhenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.1.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.1.5: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pesalehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍantā pesale bhikkhū omasissanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.1.6: jātiyāpi, nāmenapi, gottenapi, kammenapi, sippenapi, ābādhenapi, liṅgenapi, kilesenapi, āpattiyāpi; hīnenapi akkosena khuṃsessanti vambhessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.1.7: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.1.8: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, pesalehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍantā pesale bhikkhū omasatha—jātiyāpi …pe… hīnenapi akkosena khuṃsetha vambhethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.1.11: “kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, pesalehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍantā pesale bhikkhū omasissatha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.1: “Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, takkasilāyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa nandivisālo nāma balībaddo ahosi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, nandivisālo balībaddo taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca—‘
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.3: gaccha tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, seṭṭhinā saddhiṃ sahassena abbhutaṃ karohi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.5: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so brāhmaṇo seṭṭhinā saddhiṃ sahassena abbhutaṃ akāsi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.7: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so brāhmaṇo sakaṭasataṃ atibandhitvā nandivisālaṃ balībaddaṃ yuñjitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.9: Atha kho, bhikkhave, nandivisālo balībaddo tattheva aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.10: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so brāhmaṇo sahassena parājito pajjhāyi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.11: Atha kho, bhikkhave, nandivisālo balībaddo taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca—‘
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.13: ‘Tathā hi panāhaṃ, bho, tayā sahassena parājito’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.14: ‘Kissa pana maṃ tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, akūṭaṃ kūṭavādena pāpesi?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.15: Gaccha tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, seṭṭhinā saddhiṃ dvīhi sahassehi abbhutaṃ karohi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.18: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so brāhmaṇo seṭṭhinā saddhiṃ dvīhi sahassehi abbhutaṃ akāsi—‘
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.20: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so brāhmaṇo sakaṭasataṃ atibandhitvā nandivisālaṃ balībaddaṃ yuñjitvā etadavoca—‘
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.22: Atha kho, bhikkhave, nandivisālo balībaddo sakaṭasataṃ atibaddhaṃ pavaṭṭesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.29: Tadāpi me, bhikkhave, amanāpā khuṃsanā vambhanā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.30: Kimaṅgaṃ pana etarahi manāpā bhavissati khuṃsanā vambhanā?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:1.2.32: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.2: dasahi ākārehi omasati— jātiyāpi, nāmenapi, gottenapi, kammenapi, sippenapi, ābādhenapi, liṅgenapi, kilesenapi, āpattiyāpi, akkosenapi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.4: dve jātiyo— hīnā ca jāti ukkaṭṭhā ca jāti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.6: jāti—caṇḍālajāti, venajāti, nesādajāti, rathakārajāti, pukkusajāti. Esā hīnā nāma jāti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.8: jāti—khattiyajāti, brāhmaṇajāti. Esā ukkaṭṭhā nāma jāti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.10: dve nāmāni— hīnañca nāmaṃ ukkaṭṭhañca nāmaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.12: nāmaṃ—avakaṇṇakaṃ, javakaṇṇakaṃ, dhaniṭṭhakaṃ, saviṭṭhakaṃ, kulavaḍḍhakaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma nāmaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.14: nāmaṃ—buddhappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ, dhammappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ, saṃghappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu anoññātaṃ anavaññātaṃ ahīḷitaṃ aparibhūtaṃ cittīkataṃ, etaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma nāmaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.16: dve gottāni— hīnañca gottaṃ ukkaṭṭhañca gottaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.18: gottaṃ—kosiyagottaṃ, bhāradvājagottaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma gottaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.20: gottaṃ—gotamagottaṃ, moggallānagottaṃ, kaccānagottaṃ, vāsiṭṭhagottaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu anoññātaṃ anavaññātaṃ ahīḷitaṃ aparibhūtaṃ cittīkataṃ, etaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma gottaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.22: dve kammāni— hīnañca kammaṃ ukkaṭṭhañca kammaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.24: kammaṃ—koṭṭhakakammaṃ, pupphachaḍḍakakammaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma kammaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.26: kammaṃ—kasi, vaṇijjā, gorakkhā, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu anoññātaṃ anavaññātaṃ ahīḷitaṃ aparibhūtaṃ cittīkataṃ. Etaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma kammaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.28: dve sippāni— hīnañca sippaṃ ukkaṭṭhañca sippaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.30: sippaṃ—naḷakārasippaṃ, kumbhakārasippaṃ, pesakārasippaṃ, cammakārasippaṃ, nahāpitasippaṃ, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu oññātaṃ avaññātaṃ hīḷitaṃ paribhūtaṃ acittīkataṃ. Etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma sippaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.32: sippaṃ—muddā, gaṇanā, lekhā, tesu tesu vā pana janapadesu anoññātaṃ anavaññātaṃ ahīḷitaṃ aparibhūtaṃ cittīkataṃ, etaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma sippaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.34: hīnā, api ca madhumeho ābādho ukkaṭṭho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.36: dve liṅgāni— hīnañca liṅgaṃ ukkaṭṭhañca liṅgaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.38: liṅgaṃ—atidīghaṃ, atirassaṃ, atikaṇhaṃ, accodātaṃ, etaṃ hīnaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.40: liṅgaṃ—nātidīghaṃ, nātirassaṃ, nātikaṇhaṃ, nāccodātaṃ. Etaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ nāma liṅgaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.46: dve akkosā— hīno ca akkoso ukkaṭṭho ca akkoso.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.48: akkoso—oṭṭhosi, meṇḍosi, goṇosi, gadrabhosi, tiracchānagatosi, nerayikosi; natthi tuyhaṃ sugati, duggatiyeva tuyhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhāti, yakārena vā bhakārena vā, kāṭakoṭacikāya vā, eso hīno nāma akkoso.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc2:2.1.50: akkoso—paṇḍitosi, byattosi, medhāvīsi, bahussutosi, dhammakathikosi, natthi tuyhaṃ duggati, sugatiyeva tuyhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhāti, eso ukkaṭṭho nāma akkoso.
